txt.en: A foul drake that goes by Svalblóth has emerged from Gundabad. This creature is said to have decimated a series of patrols, and laid waste to several groups of proud dwarf warriors.\n\nSeek out this creature and drive it away from the battlefield.
A foul drake that goes by Svalblóth has emerged from Gundabad. The survivors from several patrols claim that this creature ate half of their group and continued to maraud across the battlefield.
A foul drake that goes by Svalblóth has emerged from Gundabad. The survivors from several patrols claim that this creature ate half of their group and continued to maraud across the battlefield.
With Svalblóth driven off, return to Hlóthi, and let him know that deed has been done.
A foul drake that goes by Svalblóth has emerged from Gundabad. The survivors from several patrols claim that this creature ate half of their group and continued to maraud across the battlefield.
With this foul beast driven off, the Gabil'akkâ can continue its push toward the gates of Gundabad.
